name: Navattic
headline: Interactive product demos
description: Navattic helps sales and marketing teams instantly create interactive product demos.
generated_description:
### Overview of Navattic

Founded in 2020 and located in New York, Navattic is an innovative SaaS company specializing in interactive product demos. A graduate of the Y Combinator W21 batch, it aims to equip sales and marketing teams with the tools to create engaging and informative product experiences that facilitate conversions. With a team of 25 employees, Navattic places strong emphasis on leveraging buyer engagement data to enhance the sales journey.

### Mission and Features

Navattic's core mission is to make buying easier through interactive product demonstrations. By allowing potential customers to engage directly with the product, they can better understand its features and benefits, ultimately leading to more informed purchase decisions. 

The platform enables users to create customized demos that can be tailored to each visitor, showcasing relevant features based on user interaction. Key functionalities include:

- **Lead Generation**: Identify and activate high-intent website visitors interested in your offerings.
- **Sales Alerts**: Provide sales teams with real-time notifications about demo engagement, enabling them to tailor their outreach based on user interest.
- **Marketing Insights**: Help marketers target accounts actively engaged with demo content, optimizing outreach strategies and improving conversion rates.

### User Adoption and Impact

Navattic has proven its worth across various industries, claiming that up to 20-25% of demo leads contribute to increased website conversion rates. The company highlights that its top demos saw an impressive 84.4% engagement rate, reflecting the effectiveness of their tools.

### Customer Experience and Integration

Navattic boasts integrations with popular CRMs like HubSpot and Salesforce, ensuring seamless data synchronization. This allows businesses to track demo engagement and funnel insights into their broader marketing and sales strategies easily.

### Closing Thoughts

With a focus on improving the customer journey through interactive engagement, Navattic is positioned not just as a tool for demo creation, but as a pivotal element in modern sales and marketing operations. Their commitment to enhancing buyer experience through rich, interactive content is a game changer for companies looking to lead in their respective spaces. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [Navattic.com](https://www.navattic.com/).
